category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 9 (Duties of Executives)
contents: Article 9 (Duties of Executives) ① The chairperson represents the committee, supervises the work of the committee, and chairs all meetings. The chairperson must prepare and keep meeting minutes recording the meeting date, place, and discussion details, and summarize the main contents of the minutes and make them public. However, the committee may decide on a specific issue by specifying the reason and not disclose it. Revised December 26, 2022. ② The vice chairperson assists the chairperson, and when the chairperson is vacant or has difficulty performing his/her duties due to an accident, he/she acts on behalf of the chairperson in order of seniority. Revised on December 26, 2022. ③ The Honorary Secretary takes charge of the general affairs of the Committee according to the order of the Chairman. [Moved from Article 7, previous Article 9 moved to Article 16 on May 15, 2017]
